title: Help
body:
In the last week I have changed my lol acc form oce to na,the reason of that is because I think na have better player than oce. But after I have start playing in na I found out that it always have at less 210 ms,that makes me really mad and I can't swich back to ice cuz there is no refund or I have to pay another 25 dollars.

Roit plz help me,plz give me a refund or help me get the ms as low as possible,I really want to play like other people with a good ms

replies.body: Since the physical distance to the NA region server is higher, you'd be seeing a much higher ping.  Generally we don't offer discounts for transfers, but we'd like to see if there's anything we can do.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll lok into your specific issue individually.  We'll reply back asap!
But I would like a refund than u guys helping me getting the ms low ty
